attributes.action: Create a system whereby only parents with children may park in parent and child parking spaces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to petition for a similar system to disabled badges for parents with cars, enabling them to park in parent and child spaces. Parents are forever struggling with small parking spaces when people without children are parked in parent and child spaces to be closer to their desired location. I want the government to give out badges with birth certificates or child benefits so child and parent parking spaces are only available for children.
